title: Customized Online Instructional Design Model Development for Strengthening Foundational Physical Chemistry Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry theory and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Requires optimization for smartphone-based learning environments and support for interpreting specialized chemistry terminology

learning_goals: Learners can explain over 80% of core physical chemistry concepts (thermodynamics, quantum chemistry, etc.) through context-specific case applications
Learners can mathematically model chemical reaction processes and improve prediction accuracy by over 70%

In groups of three, learners solve five chemical equation balancing problems step-by-step using online collaboration tools (Google Jamboard, Miro, etc.), document each solution with screenshots and text, and receive peer feedback of 3.0 or higher out of 4.0

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
